about_the_game: Nothing looks or runs as hot as the content you get in this Nitro Fire Pack.  With a nod to the nitro flames in its head-turning design, this content pack features an exclusive Funny Car, Driver's Suit, Parachute, and Vehicle-Hauler each decked out in the distinctively powerful Nitro Fire design. And then make it truly your own by adding to your Nitro Fire Funny Car and Vehicle Hauler the in-game sponsors you earn with each compelling win.
detailed_description: Nothing looks or runs as hot as the content you get in this Nitro Fire Pack.  With a nod to the nitro flames in its head-turning design, this content pack features an exclusive Funny Car, Driver's Suit, Parachute, and Vehicle-Hauler each decked out in the distinctively powerful Nitro Fire design. And then make it truly your own by adding to your Nitro Fire Funny Car and Vehicle Hauler the in-game sponsors you earn with each compelling win.

fullgame.name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed For All

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - Nitro Fire Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 2700 X @ 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nothing looks or runs as hot as the content you get in this Nitro Fire Pack.
